name: basement
longDescription: You're in the Basement. The cement floor and brick walls bounce every small sound back at you. An eerie howl echoes from outside. There's a bin against one side of the room, along with a pile of cans. The door to the Lower Hall is to the west.
shortDescription: You're in the Basement. There's a bin against one side of the room, along with a pile of cans. The Lower Hall is to the west.

tin can.True: All of the cans look empty except one. They have no labels.
tin can.False: All of the cans look empty. They have no labels.

Examine.bin: It's full of empty tin cans.
Examine.cans: It's a pile of cans. It smells... unpleasant.

Take.can: You grab the only unopened can.
